TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeometryHitTestParameters extends System.Windows.Media.HitTestParameters

summary.span: 指定 作為參數，以用於點擊測試視覺化樹狀結構。

span.span: Specifies a as the parameter to be used for hit testing a visual tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與類別，您可以使用值點擊測試，以判斷任何視覺化的物件是否與交集值。With the class, you can use a value for hit testing, to determine whether any visual object intersects with the value. 您也可以按測試與藉由建立值物件。You can also hit test with a value by creating a object. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 點擊測試只考慮在點擊測試幾何的填滿的區域。 hit testing only considers the filled area of a geometry during a hit test. 如果您建立點，點擊的測試不會交集的任何項目因為點有不含區域。If you create a point , the hit test would not intersect anything because a point has no area. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用點擊的測試如方法。The following example shows how to set up a hit test using for the method. 值傳遞至`OnMouseDown`方法用來建立以展開的點擊測試範圍的物件。The value that is passed to the `OnMouseDown` method is used to create a object in order to expand the range of the hit test. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet10)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet10)] 屬性提供資訊的使用點擊測試結果作為點擊測試參數。The property of provides information about the results of a hit test that uses a as a hit test parameter. 下圖顯示之點擊的測試的幾何 （藍色圓形） 和目標物件 （紅色方格） 之間的關聯性。The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the target object (the red square). ![圖表中使用之 IntersectionDetail 的點擊測試](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "圖表的 IntersectionDetail 在點擊測試")![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing") 點擊的測試幾何和目標物件之間的交集Intersection between hit test geometry and target object

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用點擊測試設定如方法。The following example shows how to set up a hit test by using for the method. A值用來建立物件以展開較寬的顯示區域上的點擊測試的範圍。A value is used to create a object to expand the range of the hit test over a wider display area. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet12)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet12)]
